overview: "Bathroom Banging" - Liza is one horny employee. During a bathroom break, she decides to call her boyfriend for a little round of phone sex.  "Deep In Slut" - Ramon wants to fuck Yurizan the sexiest teller at this bank. The only problem is that he's broke and Yurizan won't give him the light of day.  "Fuck For The Promotion" - Tory has to decide between two young candidates who deserve the big promotion. She commands that they tag team her wet holes to prove they have what it takes to rise to the occasion!  "If I'm Fired, You're Fucked" - Dayna and Mick are colleagues but she is offered a wonderful promotion to general director and will be running things. Problem is, she's got to get rid of Mick!  "Fuck Me Till I'm Fired" - Juelz wants to get fired from her job so she can get a big pay out. She gets her message across by fucking coworker Kieran on her boss's desk.
tagline: Busty work babes getting drilled on the job!
title: Big Tits At Work 20
